means: 讲究吃的，贪婪的，好色的

sentence.Network_en: Masses not only can satiate, and lickerish good after lubricious fragrance.
sentence.Network_cn: 群众不仅能够吃饱, 而且讲究吃好,追求色香味了.

list.abs: Masses not only can satiate , and lickerish good after lubricious fragrance ., 群众不仅能够吃饱 , 而且讲究吃好 , 追求色香味了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: alteration of obsolete lickerous, in the same sense, from an Anglo-Norman French variant of Old French lecheros (see lecherous)
